## Research Lab Specialist in the laboratory of Dr. Jason M.L. Miller

**Kellogg Eye Center, University of Michigan – Ann Arbor**

**2015 - 2021**

![](images/Kellogg-Eye_Logo-Horizontal-CMYK.png){width="80%"}

<a href="https://jasonmiller.lab.medicine.umich.edu/home" target="_blank">Miller Lab</a> \| <a href="https://jasonmiller.lab.medicine.umich.edu/research/publications" target="_blank">Publications</a><br>

Investigating the effect of autophagy induction on dry Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD) using an in vitro retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) model. Examining the differences in transcriptome and secretome of human fetal and adult RPE cultures.
